programme.title: A Hundred Memories Ep7
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s, it depicts the friendship between 2 bus attendants Yeong-rye and Jong-hee, and their affectionate first love surrounding Jae-pil.

programme.title: A Hundred Memories Ep8
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s, it depicts the friendship between 2 bus attendants Yeong-rye and Jong-hee, and their affectionate first love surrounding Jae-pil.

programme.title: THE TERROR, LIVE
programme.desc: A newsman discovers he's been rigged with a bomb after he has an exclusive interview with a terrorist who blew up a bridge.

programme.title: THE ROUNDUP: PUNISHMENT
programme.desc: Ma Seok-Do investigates a drug-trafficking app, uncovers a link to an illegal organization. As Baek Chang-Gi terrorizes the gambling market, an alliance is formed to stop the threat.

programme.title: ONCE AGAIN
programme.desc: Woo-seok in his 40's has always dreamt of going back to his high school days when he had the best days of his life. After an accident, he wakes up and finds himself in the year 1997...

programme.title: THE DIVINE FURY
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: BOTTOM OF THE WATER
programme.desc: Ga-young's sister died six year ago. One day, Ga-young is chased by a vengeful water spirit who appears as her sister. She strives to solve the mystery of her sister's tragic death.

programme.title: SHOOT ME IN THE HEART
programme.desc: A young man develops schizophrenia after his mother's suicide. After he meets a kindred spirit at the psychiatric hospital, he forges a plan with the man to escape.

programme.title: RETURN OF THE MAFIA
programme.desc: Ten years after welcoming Dae-suh into their family, the Three-J clan leaves their mafia past behind to establish a construction company. However, when Dae-suh becomes president, the three brothers plot against him, fearing he’ll take over.

programme.title: DEADMAN
programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: THE KING'S LETTERS
programme.desc: King Sejong desires to create an original alphabet for his people. With the help of others, they struggle to create the Korean alphabet Hangul.

programme.title: ONE WIN
programme.desc: Woo-jin is the newly appointed manager of a girls' volleyball team which is going to disband. The new owner sold all ace players for money and asked the team to win at least once.

programme.title: THE FATAL ENCOUNTER
programme.desc: King Jeongjo, known as “The King of Misfortune”, fights to survive an assassination attempt with the help of his loyal servant, who has a secret connection to the assassin.

programme.title: THE DEVIL'S DEAL
programme.desc: A national assembly candidate, a hidden politics powerhouse and a gangster rivals for a top secret document that will shake the nation's core.

programme.title: KILLING ROMANCE
programme.desc: As a popular actress has growing discontentment towards her marriage, she begins planning to kill her rich husband with her neighbor.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: The dollhouse is immersed in imaginative Wild West play with Sheriff Gabby, Sheriff Pandy, and CatRat the Bandit. Sheriff Gabby and Sheriff Pandy must safely deliver gold to the bank, but it gets confiscated by Bandit CatRat! They go on an adventure to get the gold back and restore order in the dollhouse.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats’ everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a recipe for dandelion soup and a soup bowl, she discovers Kitty Fairy is sick! Gabby and Pandy make her some delicious dandelion soup and while she rests, they take care of her Garden. With the help of all the Gabby Cats, they water the Singing Flowers, help the Rainbow Kitty Bushes regain their color, and sing some fussy Itty Bitty Blossoms a lullaby. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song!

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along – they’re so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Jealous of the Thunder Sisters, the men on the farm undergo a series of difficult initiation rituals to try and join the exclusive tribe of women.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: The Sky Torcher & Flame Throwers invade the Crystal Realm. Tom must conquer his demons and bond with the Fault Ripper to defeat the Sky Torcher.

programme.title: Naledi: A Baby Elephant's Tale
programme.desc: Naledi follows the journey of a baby elephant orphaned in a rescue camp, as the man tasked with her survival races to protect an entire species while fighting to save her life.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: From birth life is filled with risk - and reward. To reach adulthood, animals must constantly overcome incredible obstacles. They must learn to find food, secure a home, attract a mate, and raise the next generation with only one thing on their mind - staying alive.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: From finding a mate in the branches, to adapting to life at height, tree dwelling animals have evolved unique traits to ensure they thrive in this hostile and complex environment.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Using ingenious adaptations, and devious techniques, prey species have evolved incredible tricks to escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Reptiles, amphibians, insects and fish are found in every corner of our world - and for this special group of animals, life is regulated by the sun.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Being just that little bit different, can bring huge advantages, but it also presents almighty challenges. By going against the grain, these animals have found unique ways to stay alive.

programme.title: Wild Portugal
programme.desc: Portugal’s diverse landscapes host unique wildlife. From Cork Oak forests in the south to deciduous forests in the north, follow iconic species through key life phases, from mating to survival in the wild.

programme.title: Wild Portugal
programme.desc: Rivers are lifelines in Wild Portugal, connecting mountains to the sea. Discover the Deer stag, frogs' spring rituals, and Grebes' dances, along with other animals and landscapes along these vital waterways.

programme.title: Wild Portugal
programme.desc: Portugal’s coastal waters and the Azores archipelago boast rich ecosystems. Explore the diverse species living in these waters and discover their unique lives in this revealing episode.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Great White Shark
programme.desc: Reptiles, amphibians, insects and fish are found in every corner of our world - and for this special group of animals, life is regulated by the sun.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: In this episode we meet some animal elders who help us understand the psychological mechanisms associated with long life and the positive social value long-lived animals bring to their communities.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: Meet some late-life lovers and explore the reasons behind their sexual longevity and their ability to reproduce well into their later years.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: What does it take to maintain alpha status as animals grow older? We investigate the responsibilities and challenges that come with being a senior leader of a pack.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: We explore the integral role that older animals play in their communities and investigate how animals learn over the course of their lives.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: Human, plant, animal, bacteria, all have one inevitable thing in common; death. In this episode we discover the ways in which aging animals defy our usual understanding of the circle of life.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: From their teeth, and claws, to incredible stealth and cunning, nature’s most lethal predators have evolved a staggering array of hunting techniques.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: In this episode we witness nature’s most extraordinary animal migrations, and discover the lengths they must go to, in order to survive.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: Baby Animals: Protecting babies against extreme conditions, hungry predators, and the threat of starvation, all animals must fight for the future of their species.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: The instinct to secure a mate is one of the most powerful that there is. From the beautiful to the bizarre, this episode explores the most amazing mating rituals from right across the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: This episode explores the world’s most toxic animals, revealing how poison and venom have given them the edge over the competition in their fight for survival.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: This episode follows the journeys of these magnificent humpbacks, from their feeding grounds to their breeding grounds, the tender moments between mother and calf, and see the dangers their calves face in their first few months, including incredible interactions with predatory killer whales. The humpbacks also face a world full of human threats, from large container ships, to the impact of seismic testing in the search for oil and gas, now threatening their very survival once more.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: Often referred to as the dinosaur fish, the coelacanth occupies a unique place in the fossil record, and when it was rediscovered almost a century ago it shook the scientific community. We follow its journey to the present day, accompanying WildOceans' scientists on an expedition to uncover more of their secrets and behaviours.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: In A 'Tale Of Two Sharks' we take a look at the incredible array of sharks found off the South African coast, focusing on the endangered Scalloped Hammerhead and the iconic Great White.

programme.title: Costa Rica: The Rise Of Nature
programme.desc: Join us on a journey to the heart of Costa Rica, to discover several fabulous Eden-like biotopes, and see the unprecedented efforts that are made every day to preserve, and in some cases restore, this exceptional natural heritage.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: The dollhouse is immersed in imaginative Wild West play with Sheriff Gabby, Sheriff Pandy, and CatRat the Bandit. Sheriff Gabby and Sheriff Pandy must safely deliver gold to the bank, but it gets confiscated by Bandit CatRat! They go on an adventure to get the gold back and restore order in the dollhouse.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats’ everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a recipe for dandelion soup and a soup bowl, she discovers Kitty Fairy is sick! Gabby and Pandy make her some delicious dandelion soup and while she rests, they take care of her Garden. With the help of all the Gabby Cats, they water the Singing Flowers, help the Rainbow Kitty Bushes regain their color, and sing some fussy Itty Bitty Blossoms a lullaby. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song!

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along – they’re so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: Saving Venice
programme.desc: Venice is under attack from climate change. Flooding is becoming more frequent. With each inundation of seawater, more salt impregnates the city's historic buildings. Can scientists and engineers find ways to protect this unique jewel of architecture, beauty and culture before it's too late?

programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. programme.title: CSI S5 E09 - Mea Culpa
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.title: Strict Ang Peyrents Ko
programme.desc: Lynette was a beautiful young woman, whose parents, Marimar and Fulgoso, were unreasonably strict with her. They refused to allow her to meet men and those who venture to court her were instantly turned away.

programme.title: Dahil Tanging Ikaw
programme.desc: Erika and Cecil are twins who were separated by poverty right after they were born. Each of them was caught up in her own existence, not knowing that somewhere not so far lived a twin. But one day, fate found a clever way to bring them back together.

programme.title: Kung Mahawi Man Ang Ulap (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The happy life of Hilda and her widowed mother, Gloria, changed for the worse when Eddie and his family moved in as their tenants. In no time at all, Gloria had gotten married to Eddie and was providing for his entire family. Still, she lived for the day when she would be able to reclaim what's rightfully hers.

programme.title: Epimaco Velasco Story, NBI
programme.desc: FPJ took on the role of the country's modern day hero, Epimaco Velasco. Presented here were some of the best known among the many celebrated cases he solved and his private life as a devoted family man.

programme.title: Ulo Ng Gang-Ho
programme.desc: The life story of Viyong, a notorious police from Balic-Balic, Samaloc.

programme.title: The Secret of Katrina Salazar
programme.desc: Her name is Katrina Salazar, a beautiful woman admired by men but sincerely loved by just one. But behind the lovely face and the pleasant countenance is a dark secret no one knows: she is a nymphomaniac.

programme.title: Hindi Mo Ako Kayang Tapakan
programme.desc: This is the story of Tacing--a woman involved in different love affairs, which resulted in endless trials and tribulations. Nardo, Tom, Ramon and Angelito, were just some of the many men who became part of Tacing's life and played parts in making her accept the reality of womanhood.

programme.title: Bagwis Ng Lawin
programme.desc: Bagwis Ng Lawin

programme.title: Muling Buksan Ang Puso (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Too much love suffocates and covetousness can breed hate.

programme.title: Kung Kailangan Mo Ako
programme.desc: The cranky and ill-natured Sharon Cuneta was the vital witness in a celebrated case and the guilty parties would do anything to put her away. While she had been trying to flee from her pursuers in a cab driven by Rudy Fernandez, they got into an accident, which made her lose her memory.

programme.title: Bangers
programme.desc: Lolo Hop and his grandsons, Hip and Hap, went to the big city to investigate the mysterious death of their brother, Hep. Lolo Hop, Hip and Hap had no idea of what they were getting into but the result was incredibly hilarious.

programme.title: Bikining Itim
programme.desc: Before Sally (Vivian Velez) leaves for Japan, she bequeaths Andoy (Joey Marquez) her black bikini to remind him of her absence, that is, in spite of his little dalliance with Tina (Cristina Gonzales).

programme.title: Dobol Trobol
programme.desc: Nino and Hero were dutiful, loyal cops. They were also inept and were the main headaches of the police force of Baguio City. It was the luck of these bumblers, though, to stumble on a major case which had its origins in China.

programme.title: SAMURAI CASTLES: Aizuwakamatsu
programme.desc: This castle, 200km north of Tokyo, was a battleground in Japan's last civil war in the mid-19th C. Modern warfare did not bring it down. We look at the secrets to the its strengths and its lords.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history and culture. This episode looks at words related to theater. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: In Saidaiji Eyo, thousands of near-naked men endure icy water and the winter cold as they are purified at a temple. Some of the normal rites are being reintroduced as the pandemic recedes.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Design X Stories
programme.desc: Today's theme: Design Hunting in Tottori. On the Sea of Japan coast, the Tottori Sand Dunes create unique, everchanging views. Our design hunt explores a culture with deep roots in the natural world.

programme.title: Let's Enjoy MATH
programme.desc: Numbler hides the measuring stick at a shoe shop so that a customer's foot cannot be measured. Barky realizes that the measurement can be made by counting how many 1-centimeter items are needed.

programme.title: TAKE TECH
programme.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Train Cruise
programme.desc: Journey through the snowy landscapes of northern Fukui Prefecture in central Japan on the Echizen Railway. Practice zazen meditation at Eiheiji, sip locally brewed sake, and dine on Echizen crab.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Japanese paper, known as washi, is attractively textured and extremely durable. In a 5-minute digest, we explore its role in modern society and examine how it represents Japanese aesthetics.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Reiho: Respect in Practice
programme.desc: For 800 years, the Ogasawara family has taught Japanese etiquette through daily actions. We learn how this cultivates self-awareness and understanding of others.

programme.title: Gateway to the Land of the Death
programme.desc: Shugendo, a unique spiritual tradition, dates back 1,300 years. Through beautiful time-lapse footage, we show its practitioners and Kumano's sacred forests, long associated with death and rebirth.

programme.title: BOSAI
programme.desc: Explore how Japan uses artificial satellites and surface observation to quickly assess flood and earthquake damage, supporting disaster preparedness.

programme.title: Icy Landscapes
programme.desc: Tsukamoto Yoshiharu (Architect) visits Nara. Long ago, people in Nara preserved ice by building an icehouse on a mountain ridge, showing how architecture can make use of natural characteristics.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Seeds of Peace
programme.desc: The Hiroshima and Nagasaki Peace Messengers visit the United Nations in Geneva each year. We join them as they call for nuclear abolition and see the complexities of global politics in a new light.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Karl and Tina:2024 Winter & Spring

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: Train Cruise
programme.desc: Journey through the snowy landscapes of northern Fukui Prefecture in central Japan on the Echizen Railway. Practice zazen meditation at Eiheiji, sip locally brewed sake, and dine on Echizen crab.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Japanese paper, known as washi, is attractively textured and extremely durable. In a 5-minute digest, we explore its role in modern society and examine how it represents Japanese aesthetics.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Reiho: Respect in Practice
programme.desc: For 800 years, the Ogasawara family has taught Japanese etiquette through daily actions. We learn how this cultivates self-awareness and understanding of others.

programme.title: Gateway to the Land of the Death
programme.desc: Shugendo, a unique spiritual tradition, dates back 1,300 years. Through beautiful time-lapse footage, we show its practitioners and Kumano's sacred forests, long associated with death and rebirth.

programme.title: BOSAI
programme.desc: Explore how Japan uses artificial satellites and surface observation to quickly assess flood and earthquake damage, supporting disaster preparedness.

programme.title: Icy Landscapes
programme.desc: Tsukamoto Yoshiharu (Architect) visits Nara. Long ago, people in Nara preserved ice by building an icehouse on a mountain ridge, showing how architecture can make use of natural characteristics.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: SAMURAI CASTLES: Aizuwakamatsu
programme.desc: This castle, 200km north of Tokyo, was a battleground in Japan's last civil war in the mid-19th C. Modern warfare did not bring it down. We look at the secrets to the its strengths and its lords.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history and culture. This episode looks at words related to theater. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: In Saidaiji Eyo, thousands of near-naked men endure icy water and the winter cold as they are purified at a temple. Some of the normal rites are being reintroduced as the pandemic recedes.

programme.desc: Mayor Greatway and Mr. Ducky-Doo want to show their skydiving skills. But when wind gets in the way, the pups help them sky dive on the ground! // When Wheeler and Truffles the pig can't ice skate, the crew finds a construction solution with wheels!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble & the pups find Grandpa Gravel's lucky bowling ball. Too bad Builder Cove doesn't have a bowling alley... until now! // When a sudden superbloom traps Motor, Lily, and Park Ranger Rose, the pups need a flower-friendly construction solution.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora, Boots, and Diego rescue a baby jaguar after it gets lost deep in the rainforest. // Dora, Boots, and Diego help a baby burrowing owl find its parents and make it home.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora, Boots, and Diego help a pair of spectacled bear brothers build an awesome nest for their Mami! // Dora, Boots, and Diego help a lost, baby lizard get home to its parents!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: When Motor needs help at the fire station, a new Fire Captain comes to town to help train all the pups as new firefighter recruits. // Charger can't wait to help Sierra Sparkle with her big show! Well, until his hurt paw causes a cone complication.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: A flock of migrating ducks settles in Builder Cove! It's up to Rubble & Crew to help the ducks start moving south. // Motor doesn't want to visit Dr. Diwa at the Vet Clinic... so the pups build a special space just for her!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Marshal gets a new BFF when a gosling he names “Fuzzy” takes a liking to him. // When Mayor Goodway accidentally takes off in a hot air balloon, Ryder and the Paw Patrol must make a dramatic rescue to save her and win the race!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Ryder and the PAW Patrol need to rescue Alex on Jakes mountain. // The pups find strange footprints in the snow on the mountain outside Adventure Bay. Everyone thinks it’s a “snow monster” and it’s scaring the skiers away.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama have announced to their dear barbababies that they are going on a trip to Easter Island. // The Barbababies, the twins, and Mr. Strict set sail on "Thésée", a magnificent sailboat.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbalala has decided to respect all the rules of the day of opposites.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tim explores Rumbleton to find somewhere he can have fun alone. // Tim and Kai try to give Parky the best day ever. // When a storm keeps the Rexes at home they must think of a game to pass the time.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: A herd of bison are migrating through Builder Cove-right toward City Hall! Rubble & Crew hop in their big vehicles to save the day. // The pups use their mega-sized trucks to help Lucas and Lily give their parents the most awesome anniversary ever.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora and Boots track down the Pirate Piggies' ship and save it from a kraken! // Dora and Boots help Bruno the Bunny find his own special dance moves in time to perform with his favorite band, the Bunny Boyz!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze must complete three amazing rescues to join the greatest emergency vehicle team in Axle City: the Monster Machine Rescue Team!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tim, Tommy and Tia can't decide on the best gift for Grandma. // Tim tries to make his own Captain DinoStar movie. // Tim fakes it to prove he's just as cool as Kai's cousin.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Alex and Mr. Porter are on a tropical Island camping trip when a freak snowstorm hits! // Mr. Porter is delivering his famous fizzy pickles to people around town when a bumpy road shakes up the deliveries and causes the pickle jars to POP.

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: The Crew build a feeder for Farmer Zoe's chickens, but when they get loose, it's up to the pups to safely rescue them.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When Axle City's letters to Santa go undelivered, Blaze and Sparkle set out on an epic adventure to the North Pole to deliver them themselves! But can they make it to Santa before Christmas?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: It's Christmas Eve and Blaze, AJ, Crusher, Pickle, and all their other friends are helping Santa ready his sleigh for delivery.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Mayor Greatway needs a lot of pizzas, fast! But when Speed Meister steps in, the pups have to fix his pizza problem. // When a family can't get to the airport in time on Speed Meister's road, Rubble & Crew has to build a new road before takeoff.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: It's Christmas Eve and Rubble & Crew gets a call from Santa Claus... he needs help to build all of the toys in time for Christmas! But when Speed Meister overhears and tries to be the construction hero, Rubble and the pups have to save Christmas.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Rubble dreams that he's been taken aboard a spaceship and meets his alien double. When the ship crashes on an alien planet, he needs help. // The Pups must save Humdinger and his kittens when they mess around with Toodles the Clown's tiny clown car.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The Pups must help to find Mayor Humdinger's mustache after he accidentally shaves it off before it's about to be on the cover of a magazine. // When a carnival train gets stuck in a tunnel, it results in a mountainside funhouse-style wild ride.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: No! It's over! Barbidur is no longer a baby, he's a big boy now! // The barbababies are going to the hypermarket for the first time.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbidur catches a mysterious masked vandal. // Tototutu, Barbidur's favorite little car, has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tim tries out some new rocket boots which soon fly out of control. // Tim, Tommy and Tia bird-sit the Bronte's MoonParrot. // Tim, Tommy and Tia take on their parents at Tailball.

The Observers are volunteers, and are not paid for their contributions.

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: The Ice Cream Truck
programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. While waiting for her husband in their new house, Mary becomes the target of an evil slasher that stalks the suburbs in an ice-cream truck. She soon learns that the suburbs are not what they seem...

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: The Fox Demon Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a story in the novel “Strange Tales from Liaozhai”, a young student in the late Ming Dynasty meets a charming fox demon and they soon fall in love. Though they encounter several obstacles due to their different nature, the lovers continue to fight against fate. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Zombie Island
programme.desc: Jeff, a big fan of zombies, goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures. What started as an adventure turns out to be a horrifying journey as they get trapped on the island and are attacked by the zombies! Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

programme.title: Creepy Pasta
programme.desc: Trapped in an abandoned house, a young man desperately searches for clues about his trapped situation. The unsettling truth actually lies in a sequence of viral videos and they gradually corrupt his mind…

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jing Wen, a struggling drama student, takes on a modelling job to help cover her tuition costs. As she becomes a model for an enigmatic artist specializing in expressive human body sketches, Jing Wen accidentally uncovers a shocking truth, plunging her into a desperate fight for survival.

programme.desc: The husband and father of a murdered family attacks their killer in court; a judge has no patience for a foul-mouthed defendant; a convicted drunk driver begs the judge for mercy; and more.

programme.title: Ura, Sauver L'Oiseau Sacré Des Australes
programme.desc: Rimatara, in French Polynesia. This island of the Austral archipelago is the scene of a battle to conserve a small colorful parakeet: the ura. Scientists, farmers and ordinary citizens are mobilized to prevent its disappearance: a success. But today, new threats weigh on this endemic species.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: The fabulous story of the chef Thierry Marx and the Eiffel Tower. Did you know that pigeon lofts were a visible sign of wealth in the Middle Ages? The eco-friendly brand Dao takes on the challenge of producing linen jeans made in France. How to wear a floral pattern.

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: In the heart of Brittany, visit the Pont-Aven museum. Interior design and a passion for cinema come together in Sandra Benhamou's world. Lacoste reinvents itself under the leadership of Pelagia Kolotouros. Patient and meticulous, restorer Marie-Cécile Kfouri brings frescoes and old canvases back to life.

programme.desc: The sculptures created by Agnès Baillon, almost always women, capture our gaze for an exchange steeped in humanity. From Parisian workshop to art gallery, scenes from everyday life displayed free of artifice but rich in nuance.

programme.desc: When social science is no longer content to merely observe society but seeks to actively contribute to its evolution. Since the Quiet Revolution, activists and university researchers have worked hand in hand to question preconceived ideas, fight prejudice and encourage reflection.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: When Mika tries too hard to win Man's Nest Employee of The Month, she creates a monster that could ruin the telethon Danger Force is hosting.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When Charlotte is challenged to a fight at school, Captain Man and Kid Danger step in to try and help Charlotte defend herself.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The Turtles and Mutanimals are caught in the Storm of the Century! But when a new group of SEA MUTANTS threaten the city... Raph will be forced to use his WORDS to save the day.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Jack & Lily are half-siblings living on opposite ends of the world both hoping to have the "best summer ever." When dangerous events forces Jack's mom to send him to live with his dad, the kids fear their summer dreams have become a nightmare.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: The family gets stuck in a traffic jam that leads to all human civility getting thrown out the passenger side window.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob learns his milkshake license has expired, and is forced to go back to the milkshake academy. // Squidward hits his head and reverts to being a baby, and it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to take care of him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward finds SpongeBob's diary, and starts reading it out loud in the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob once again fails his driving test, forcing Mrs. Puff to think outside the box--and off the road.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Karen gets a computer virus, and it's up to SpongeBob to get it out of her!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: In this fitness variety show, Patrick learns how to exercise. // A family of dummies move into the Star home.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: In a Patrick Show episode about boats, Cecil teaches Patrick how to drive. // Patrick time-travels in a race for the Krusty Krab's newest menu item.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Begonia, Lily, and Blossom teach Wild a lesson after her steals their cupcakes. // Chef is worried when the main ingredient for his famous Equinox pie, the Yummyus, is late blooming.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: When the Smurfs recruit a new fire brigade, Clumsy and Dimwitty disguise themselves to take part. // Papa Smurf is excited to pick the magic Sarsaparillo plant, but he's not the only one hunting for the rare plant.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: The family tries to help Bobby get over his test taking anxieties. // Carl gets lost in the city zoo after sneaking away from his family, in search of Keyon, the Komodo dragon.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Bobby struggles to give up control of the mercado during his pizza-versary date with Lori. // When Ronnie Anne notices that she's the only person Carlitos won't copy, she's determined to change it!

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: The family prepares for war, AKA a trip to the local Asian market. After their battle to procure a rare cookie, Jack feels more part of the family. // The Groom & Board gets a bad review. Lily tries to find the culprit and "correct the record.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Lil's favorite boba shop is closing! The kids try to save the café using pucker limes, but are quickly forced to save Canyon Valley from the pucker. // Lil and Min both realize how similar they are to their moms and set out to distinguish themselves.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When one of Sandy's experiments goes awry, the Cheeks family team up to save Christmas in Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: Afterlife ep 3
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.title: The Last Woman Standing ep 10
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a man's four mistresses compete against one another to become his next wife, as his wife's ghost continues to haunt them.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 2
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.title: Sing Galing: Singlebrity Edition ep 28
programme.desc: Sing Galing: Sing-lebrity Edition, aims to provide fun, laughter, music and excitement with the added goal of helping as celebrities sing and play for their chosen beneficiaries.

programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 13
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?
